posts.post_content:
Hi guys. This group has been moved to greener pastures, and while I am unsure if the cards will be sold or not, I will provide the new owner with a list of board members as well as the card they had inquired about.

Thank you very much for your time and interest.

Derek

Collins (HOF) – Philadelphia Athletics (AL)
